message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a limited time at the price of $130. I believe it will be very beneficial to you, and this is a very competitive price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $100 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down a bit to $120.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $120 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
